description: Frontend developer with more than 4 years of experience working in the fintech industry
aboutDesc: I have worked on IT since 2021
aboutP1: I've finished my carrer 'TUDAI' (Tecnicatura Universitaria en Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Informáticas) in 2020, in UNICEN, with a great passion about well made things, in the last of college I've develop a big interest in UI and UX design to the point of having a lot of experience using Figma
aboutP3: Spanish is my mother tongue and I have a high level of English beside never done any regulatory exams
experienceP1: As an employee of EDSA I've the opportunity of working on the side of the client, with a great team and companions helping each other to develop a tool for the client
experienceP2: EDSA it's a software consultant company that helps other companies to fullfil their needs
projectP1: This project was born as a hobby and by the my love for Pokemon, it is currently on development.
projectP2: My goal is to create a webapp that allows you to visualize pokemons shown as cards, mixing elements from the pokedex and from the trading cards game.
projectP3: I use Figma for the design and React for the development.
